definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: tremble, quake (NH id., Hiph. shake (rare), [[רְעָדָה]] a trembling, shaking; Ar. ra9ada thunder (said of sky), VIII. tremble, quiver; Eth. r9da: tremble; J Aram. [[רְעַד]] tremble, shake);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[וַתִּרְעָָד]] Ps 104:32 and it (the earth) trembleth at the gaze of ´[[י]]:, in theoph.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[עָמַדְתִּי מַרְעִיד]] Da 10:11 I stood trembling; pl. [[מַרְעִדִים]] Ezr 10:9, c. [[יׇשַׁב]].
